node.title: Python —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫
node.text:
#job #–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è  #dataengineer #remote

–í—Å–µ–º –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç! –ú—ã¬†-¬†PeakData AG¬†–∏—â–µ–º Data Engineer.

Position:¬†Data Engineer
Company:¬†Peakdata (http://peakdata.ch/)
Location:¬†remote.
Salary range in USD: 2,500 - 3,200 USD/month (gross)
Salary range in RUB: 180 000 ‚Äì 230 000 Rub/month (na ruki)
Contact:¬†mfeldman@peakdata.ch

We are young and ambitious startup in the field of AI and Data Science looking for a  join our team. We are active in the area of web mining and Language Processing. Are you up for the challenge?¬†

Responsibilities:¬†
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to process and integrate disparate data from different data sources
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to think with creativity, propose and lead development of data crunching software modules (mostly text analysis. NLP big plus)
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to work with version control system (Git)
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to understand software architecture and the existing workflow
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to clearly communicate in English
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to work independently in the remote work setting
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to overlap with our business hours for a great collaboration.¬†

Requirements:
¬†‚Ä¢ At least 1 year of professional experience in data engineering/machine learning
¬†‚Ä¢ Experienced in the relevant Python and its libraries; Especially appreciated is the knowledge of the following libraries: pandas, request, beatifulsoup, lxml, scrappy, selenium, joblib
¬†‚Ä¢ Experience with backend development in Python - BIG PLUS
¬†‚Ä¢ Bachelor degree in computer science ‚ÄìPLUS
¬†‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of Docker - PLUS
¬†‚Ä¢ Good documentation skills
¬†‚Ä¢ Good written and spoken English
¬†‚Ä¢ Strong sense of ownership and responsibility for code quality that follows best practices
¬†‚Ä¢ Strong coding, problem-solving, and debugging skills
¬†‚Ä¢ Awesome communication, collaboration, and self-management skills.¬†

What we offer:
¬†‚Ä¢ Very interesting and innovative data product which includes real-world web data at scale (Tera to Petabytes)
¬†‚Ä¢ Competitive salary
¬†‚Ä¢ Highly professional and innovative team (most of our team members have either Masters or PhD)
¬†‚Ä¢ Flexible work environment with opportunity to work remotely at¬†¬†pajamas from your kitchen and still be part of interesting and innovative project üôÇ¬†If you feel like you might be a good fit please drop us a message at¬†mfeldman@peakdata.ch
